skill.author: DNYoussef

security_audit.summary: This is a legitimate DevOps validation tool. It contains an embedded bash script for pre-deployment quality gates, security scanning, and documentation checks. All capabilities align with its stated purpose of deployment readiness validation.

content.value_statement: Code often fails in production due to missed quality gates. This skill runs comprehensive pre-deployment validation including security scans, performance benchmarks, and documentation checks to catch issues before deployment.
actual_capabilities: Runs complete quality audit pipeline with theater, functionality, and style checks
Performs security deep-dive scanning for vulnerabilities and hardcoded secrets
Validates performance benchmarks against defined SLAs
Checks documentation completeness including README and deployment guides
Audits dependencies for known vulnerabilities using npm audit
Generates deployment checklist and rollback plan
limitations: Cannot modify code to fix issues it finds
Load testing requires manual execution for production environments
Performance benchmarks may be skipped for non-production environments

Address critical and high-severity findings immediately
Use generated deployment checklist as sign-off document
anti_patterns: Deploying without reviewing the generated checklist
